docs.lead_paragraph: SENTIMENTAL people who write or speak of Amelia E. Barr as 85 years young do her a great injustice. She is 85 years old; she has not the affectation of youthful vivacity, she has the wisdom of splendid old age. She has written sixty-six books, she has given birth to fifteen children. They were good books, they were (no one can doubt) good children.

headline.main: AMELIA E. BARR IS PROPHETIC; Veteran Novelist, at 85, Sees War as the Savior of the Modern Woman, Whom Idleness Has Made Selfish.
